attributes.action: Have supermarkets and shops include support/key workers along side the nhs.
attributes.additional_details: The way some key /care workers are treated is humiliating and shameful were not good enough because we dont have nhs on our identification cards. refused admission to shop for vunerable people why should this be so? We are doing our job .. We're in this together so treat everyone with the same respect and equality.
attributes.background: We would like all carers and key workers to be acknowledged along side nhs workers when shopping with All major supermarkets and retail.. To notify all retail accordingly

rejection.details:
The opening and delivery arrangements for supermarkets are a matter for individual retailers, not the Government or Parliament. A number of retailers include care workers in priority arrangements. You should contact your local retailer for individual policies.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
